tweets.text: @SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA I would advise everyone to read all the documents on the @EnvAgency page for Whalley‚Äôs. The permit is issued with many conditions that @RedIndustries2 must adhere to including odour control. Legal action against @EnvAgency for failure to hold the permit holder accountable anyone?

Complete contempt and disregard to the community and esp our children. They cannot be schooled without stink, they cannot get hospital treatment without stink (it even pervades operating theatres), they cannot play without stink #stopthestink @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off https://t.co/nYIFxiaq2m

The @EnvAgency think we are stupid - the fumes can often be better or less widespread in summer then when the colder weather comes they get worse. @SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 @Cap_it_off Complaints were being made by residents before @EnvAgency authorised a 60% increase in waste tipped. @RedIndustries2 were tipping 60% more than their permit allowed before @EnvAgency authorised it ! @sunnyraisin62 @SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 Got to go for it now, clearly @ClareDInnisEA is incapable of stopping us being poisoned, no chance of clean air down that route, we need evacuating paid for by @RedIndustries2 to return home when stench had been sorted. @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency Look at the money Red have handed out to local clubs, charities etc they had a plan from the start, they got a 60% increase in financial turnover when the permit change was authorised. @EnvAgency are complicit in all of this, previous MP turned blind eye to it as well!

tweets.text: @RedIndustries2 That's it the deadline has passed. @EnvAgency If you don't punish them we're coming for you.

Today we published ‚ÄúDoing its job?‚Äù, a report on the @EnvAgency and its role protecting English rivers, lakes and streams. The report shows Agency failing to protect rivers, with its hands tied by central Gov. The time to reverse river damage is now https://t.co/y71Uhx7jzp

When did the @EnvAgency and @DefraGovUK become enemies of environmental protection and campaigning? There is compelling evidence that they are but not yet why. Whistleblowers, your time has arrived. https://t.co/0iGmwlv2oj

urls.title: #EndSewagePollution-SewageBill ‚Ä¢ Surfers Against Sewage
urls.description: Philip Dunne MP is the main sponsor of this Bill and will be there when the Bill is debated. How about telling your friends and family to contact their MP? Your MP has already pledged their support for the Bill but we really need them to show up for our rivers and attend the second reading debate. It looks like your MP does not make an email address available to their constituents. You can write to them at their postal address. Find the details on your MP's parliamentary page. Thank you for supporting The

tweets.text:
‚ö†Ô∏èPollution Incident‚ö†Ô∏è 
This is what Raw #SewagePollution pouring into the Gannel Estuary, Cornwall, looks like.
We need tough laws and proper enforcement to #EndSewagePollution.  Email your MP today https://t.co/Vp6OP5vjoX
Video @BigGreenSurf https://t.co/8HPnAIdnu0

Off to Cornwall for the bank holiday with your family?  Check out this video from @sascampaigns showing raw sewage going straight into the Gannel Estuary near to Newquay and Crantock beach Shouldn‚Äôt @SouthWestWater be fined? @EnvAgency Cc @DefraGovUK https://t.co/YQAQ0nrVX2

Thinking about a bank holiday paddle on our Anglian rivers? It might have been a while, so make sure you know the water conditions before you set off ‚Äì our rivers sometimes have strong flows which can make paddling dangerous. tweets.text: @maireadc_2010 @annjsmall @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @NotoLandfillMK @StinkStopthe None of us should have this inflicted on us how dare they ruin our lives and health like this . In the words of my son's placard they took our air and that is not right xx https://t.co/tNwhgF6KXZ
@annjsmall @HelenVi00175623 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @NotoLandfillMK @StinkStopthe Thanks for the support, taking alot of inspiration from your campaign ‚ù§

@HelenVi00175623 @maireadc_2010 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @NotoLandfillMK @StinkStopthe We know what they are suffering at hands of landfill profiteers, stand together, support each other, & we will get our clean air one day.

It feels like being in the middle of a nightmare horror film @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_uk and we are not in isolation. We stand with our friends #mullaghglass #biffawestmill @NotoLandfillMK and say NO MORE @StinkStopthe https://t.co/ikCE2ibGyD

It‚Äôs a huge problem when The Silverdale Stink makes @BBCr4today Thought for the DayüôèAre you thinking about the stench & health concerns?@ClareDinnisEA @PHE_uk @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/o4d8n64HhX

@StinkStopthe Basically they know this will not work... Dinnis said as much yesterday with her discussion of more work to come. Fundamentally, there are huge problems at that site I reckon. Too little too late from the EA #StopTheStink - it just gets worse. Last night was unbearable.

Things I thought I‚Äôd never tweet for the @EnvAgencyYNE ‚Ä¶.

A friend got this clip of a deer swimming and wondering round the #RiverDon in #KelhamIsland, #Sheffield.

It‚Äôs really nice to see nature so close to urban centres‚Ä¶.. it‚Äôs called @theoutdoorcity for a reason üôå https://t.co/caWjbvP2JT

The capping was supposed to address the outrageous levels of odour we have endured recently. If it turns out that it has not, it strengthens the case for:

(a) capping off the entire site
(b) moving to the restoration phase
(c) an inquiry into the EA's handling of the site (2/2)

@welshharpies @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgency @Brent_Council @BarnetCouncil @CRTNorthWest @CRTSouthEast @CRTnotices @NaturalEngland @ben_watt @WildLondon @WildlifeTrusts @MPSWelshHarp @BBCLondonNews @WildlifeMag If an angling club had an active role here, the reservoir would not have got into the state it it. Anglers are great conservationists. All the lakes that I have ever fished are pristine, clean & flourishing. Full of wildlife & rare birds. Has this ever been raised?

tweets.text:
EA UPDATE

The @EnvAgency have issued an update this evening, ahead of the midnight deadline.

Reading between the lines, it seems that the EA are not confident that the capping work will produce the reduction in odour we have been hoping for.

This is very disappointing. (1/2) https://t.co/DIZFt1teMz
@davemh72 @StinkStopthe @SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids of course they will, and the EA have let it get to this point ,to big to fail

It was like that from mid evening ,at least 9 hours of exposure & health symptoms for many people. In the top 5 worst night we‚Äôve ever had. Unforgivable @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA Cap it, close it, clean it up or we‚Äôll be coming for you in court #stopthestink https://t.co/hwvsch5ZPH

@SianieRoo @LoneRanger77777 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe 6am this morning. Driving through the Westlands and all the way through to the M6 jnct 15 it was horrendous. Unbearable stench.
@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA Your organisation it not fit for purpose. You should resign and the @EnvAgency should be disbanded #stopthestink https://t.co/aubgp7ShLC

@sunnyraisin62 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 Yes please. If the regulator continues to hold back from strong enough action to stop those fumes we absolutely have to start looking a lot bigger @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink
@davemh72 @tayz_BETH @SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL @BorisJohnson Red‚Äôs wrists will be stinging next week from all this slapping

tweets.text: @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency It‚Äôs ironic when you read the permit authorisation to increase by 60% the annual tonnage, that Silverdale Parish Council accurately predicted where we are now.
